Package autumn.lang.compiler.ast.commons

Interface IBinaryOperation

All Superinterfaces:
IConstruct, IExpression, IOperation
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddOperation, AndOperation, ConcatOperation, DivideOperation, EqualsOperation, GreaterThanOperation, GreaterThanOrEqualsOperation, IdentityEqualsOperation, IdentityNotEqualsOperation, ImpliesOperation, LessThanOperation, LessThanOrEqualsOperation, ModuloOperation, MultiplyOperation, NotEqualsOperation, NullCoalescingOperation, OrOperation, SubtractOperation, XorOperation
public interface IBinaryOperation extends IOperation
An instance of this interface is an AST node that represents a binary-operation.
Author:
Mackenzie High
